seo.title: QuickToPDF - Free Online PDF Converter
seo.description: Convert, compress, merge, split, and edit your PDF files for free. Support for Word, Excel, JPG, and more. No registration required.
seo.keywords: pdf converter, online pdf tool, convert pdf to word, pdf to excel, compress pdf, merge pdf, ilovepdf, smallpdf, pdf2go, convert files online, image to pdf, pdf editor, word to pdf, ppt to pdf, pdf to jpg, secure pdf conversion, free pdf tools, edit pdf online, split pdf pages, quicktopdf, online file conversion, docx to pdf, fast pdf tool, resume to pdf, scan to pdf, pdf form filler

about.title: About Us
about.intro: QuickToPDF is a completely free platform that allows you to convert your files quickly and securely. You can easily convert PDF, Word, Excel, image, audio, and text files to each other. No registration is required and all operations are instant.

about.feature2: Merge, split, compress, and edit PDFs
about.feature3: No fees, hidden restrictions, or ad blockers
about.freeNote: QuickToPDF is completely free. None of your files are stored on our servers and your operations are confidential.

kvkk.title: Privacy Policy (KVKK)
kvkk.intro: At QuickToPDF, we highly value user privacy. Your personal data is never stored, shared, or disclosed to third parties.
kvkk.rule1: Uploaded files are used only for conversion and are automatically deleted after the process.
kvkk.rule2: No file or personal data is permanently stored on our servers.
kvkk.rule3: All data is completely deleted from the system every 5 minutes.
kvkk.rule4: No user information is shared with third parties.
kvkk.note: The highest level of security is provided for your data. Your operations with QuickToPDF are completely safe and confidential.
